translations.en:
: ** :walking: While walking through a village, you notice a group of people. Up close, you quickly notice a hanging in progress. After some discussion, you learn this person is sentenced to death for "words contrary to the values of the church"

:money_with_wings: Steal from the audience.
:punch: Stand in the way to prevent the man from dying.
:walking: Continue on your journey peacefully

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*

translations.en: ** | ğŸ’¸ After robbing a few people, you leave with an object that seems very interesting! After walking for about 30 minutes, you look at what it is.

translations.en: ** | ğŸ‘Š After struggling to get through the crowd, you intervene as quickly as possible and manage to get the man out of there. After running through the village, the man, very grateful, offers you an object that will serve you for the rest of your adventure.

translations.en: ** | ğŸ‘Š After succeeding in leaving the site with the man, you get caught and beat up by a group of people. After initially feeling relieved, you notice these people have stolen from you.

translations.en: ** | ğŸ‘Š After trying to violently intervene, the executioner grabs you by force. You're struggling, but nothing can change that. You, in turn, are sentenced to death. :skull:
